Detailed Description

The base class for the KeyChooser.

Do not use directly, create a KeyChooser with createInstance , this will create the proper one of the classes that inherit from CKeyChooser

Author:
The BibleTime team

)  [static]
 

Creates a proper Instance, either.

CLexiconKeyChooser or CBibleKeyChooser

Parameters:

key   if not NULL, the CKey the KeyChooser should be set to
parent   the parent of the widget to create
